content.raw: I'm not sure we want to do this; copy the shared pointer to the sdf element which was originally used to load the sensor. Consider loading a Sensor from an SDF file, and then copying that Sensor. The question is, do we want to keep the pointer back to the sdf::Element? I had not been doing this because the new sensor was not technically parsed from an SDF file. Thoughts?
